title: US Stocks End Lower as Latest CPI Fails to Lift Rate-Cut Spirits
description: US stocks fell on Tuesday as the latest inflation data failed to shift interest-rate cut bets and traders examined fresh earnings reports.
content: US stocks fell on Tuesday as the latest inflation data failed to shift interest-rate cut bets and traders examined fresh earnings reports.
